import styles from "assets/jss/material-kit-pro-react/views/ecommerceSections/productsStyle.jsx"; class SectionProducts extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { checked: [1, 9, 27], priceRange: [101, 790] }; // let currencyHigh = priceHigh.dataset.currency; // priceLow.innerHTML = currencyLow + Math.round(values[0]); // priceHigh.innerHTML = currencyHigh + Math.round(values[1]); // }); } handleToggle(value) { const { checked } = this.state; const currentIndex = checked.indexOf(value); const newChecked = [...checked]; if (currentIndex === -1) { newChecked.push(value); } else { newChecked.splice(currentIndex, 1); } this.setState({ checked: newChecked }); } render() { const { classes } = this.props; return (
